model.name: i Charts Generate - line chart / bar chart / pie cahrt / radar chart / scatter / radial
model.description:
The only chart plugin that supports variables and custom bar graphics.

----------------------->

What is the difference：

  1. Support use variables，Edit your palette as a variable and upload it, however, Local variables can only be used on the current document; It’s recommended to use variables from other libraries for cross-document compatibility.
  2. More bar chart styles and you can even draw any graph as your own;
  3. Support upload and save your own commonly used fields (xlsx format), so that you can reuse them in the future.
  4. Fetch data and config from existing charts (Useful when you need to adjust the style of a chart but don't want to change its data);

----------------------->

Already supported：

  1. Bar - horizontal and vertical, supports grouping, stacking and other features
  2. Line - horizontal and vertical, supporting various features such as curve, area, stacking, etc.;
  3. Bar and line combination - same as 1 and 2;
  4. Pie - pie charts, donut charts, rose charts, all support 3D extrusion;
  5. Radar – As you know a radar chart;
  6. Scatter - scatter points, also supports bubbles (just provide the third row of data);
  7. Radial - any start and end angles Radial;

Enjoy it and let me know if you have any questions and I will reply as soon as possible.

-------------------------

这应该是目前唯一支持变量和自定义柱条图形的图表插件。

----------------------->

有何不同：

  1. 支持变量，以变量编辑您的调色板然后上传即可，但注意：来源于当前文件的变量仅在当前文件可用，若希望色板跨文件可用，请通过引用已发布的库变量的方式配置色板。
  2. 支持更多的柱条样式和自定义柱条样式
  3. 支持上传和保存你的常用字段，以便将来你能够重复使用它们。
  4. 支持从已创建的图表中获取并回填数据和配置，这在你想调整图表样式而不想改变数据时非常有用。

----------------------->

已支持图表：

  1. 柱图 - 水平和垂直，支持分组、堆叠等各种特性
  2. 线图 - 水平和垂直，支持曲线、面积、堆叠等各种特性；
  3. 柱线组合图 - 同1、2；
  4. 饼图 - 饼图、环图、玫瑰图，全部支持3D挤出;
  5. 雷达图 - 如您所知的雷达图那样;
  6. 散点图- 散点，同时支持气泡（提供第三行数据即可）;
  7. 径向图-支持任意起始和结束角度；

model.name: Charts+ (by Highcharts)
model.description:
Welcome to the Highcharts Community!


🚀 About Highcharts Core

Highcharts Core is a powerful plugin designed for Figma that allows you to create and adjust charts seamlessly within your design environment.


Key Features:

  1. Comprehensive Chart Support: Instantly generate various chart types including line, bar, gauge, pie, and area charts.
  2. Live Resizing (New!) Charts now automatically resize as you drag the frame — no more re-generating or guesswork.
  3. Figma Slides Support (New!) Insert charts directly into Figma Slides
  4. Effortless Adjustments: Already made a chart? No problem! Update existing charts with just a few clicks to keep them up to date and consistent across your projects.
  5. User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a simple, intuitive interface that allows you to tweak and fine-tune your charts.
  6. Local Variables for Design Systems: Leverage local variables to create and utilize design systems, allowing you to standardize chart components across different projects and ensure design consistency.
  7. Custom Data for Charts: Now you can import your own custom data directly into the plugin to generate charts. This new feature empowers users to visualize real-world data, offering more flexibility and precision in creating unique, data-driven designs.
  8. Enhanced Data Random Generator: Upgraded the data random generator for more realistic and varied data generation, improving the testing and preview experience.
  9. Collaboration with Developers: Once you've designed your charts, easily send them to developers who can integrate them with our Highcharts library. This streamlined process reduces the time and effort needed to perfect designs, ensuring your visualizations are beautiful and functional in your final product.



📣 Feedback

We are would love your feedback. Share your thoughts, experiences and suggestions in the comments section, or reach out directly via email at figmasupport@highsoft.com. Your input is invaluable and helps us shape the future of Highcharts Core.


🤝 Figma Plugin Development Team

The Highcharts Core Figma plugin was developed by Black Label and Highsoft. Black Label has been the dedicated support and development team for Highcharts and Highsoft for over a decade.


Thank you for being part of our community and helping us build a tool designers love!

Set and enforce character limits on text layers with Check Character Limit.


Usage

  1. Add [CharLimit: XX] to the name of your text layers. XX is the maximum character count for the layer. For example: Description Text [CharLimit: 2000].

  3. Text layers that exceed their limits will be flagged in red. Check the top of your layer list to locate the flags.
  4. Select a flag from the layer list and press Shift + 2 to locate it visually.
  5. Edit the text layer to fit your character limit.


Note

If nothing is selected while running the plugin it will check all the text layers on the page. To check a specific layer or all layers inside a frame, select the layers or frame and run the plugin.

model.name: Magia Record Character Grid Creator Interface
model.description:
This plugin is for creating a grid view of your Magical Girls in the game Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story (https://magiarecord-en.com/). The game does not include a good overview for displaying all you owned Magical Girls and how awakened and upgraded they are, so this plugin creates that view as image for easy sharing.

Installing the Plugin
1. Duplicate the Figma project (https://www.figma.com/file/jcgWY0YGzPbAwBp47LV3oL/Magia-Record-Character-Grids). 
2. Install the plugin and open the Magia Record Character Grids Project.
3. Right click on the background or go to the hamburger menu and select Plugins > Magia Record Character Grid Creator Interface
4. The HTML window for the plugin will open.

Features
1. Create a fully detailed Character Displays for your Magical Girls, including: Character Card, Stars (Rank), Attribute, Experience Level, Magic Level, Magia Level, and Episode Level.
2. Available values for each field are automatically filled in and available for selection for easy creation.
3. Update an existing Character Display if a mistake was made or as you progress though the game.
4. Copy the properties of an existing Character Display to create a new or update an existing one.
5. Automatic placement of newly created Character Displays with respect to the selected Character Display or parent Frame.
6. Convert copied Character Display frames from one file to another file to work with the new file.
7. Group and Sort Character Displays in a frame based on selected properties.
8. Set Backgrounds for the frames containing Character Displays.

Usage

Create new Character Display
1. Either select an existing instance or frame (can be the document itself)
2. Select the properties you want.
3. Press Create.

Update an Existing Character Display
1. Select an existing instance of a Character Display.
2. Press the Copy and all properties appear in fields.
3. Modify the fields you want to update.
3. Press Update. 

Create new Character Display with Existing Properties
1. Select an existing instance of a Character Display.
2. Press the Copy and all properties appear in fields.
3. Modify any fields if desired.
4. Press Create.

Convert Copied Character Displays from Another File
1. Copy and paste either a Character Display instance(s) or an entire frame containing all the instances to convert from one file to another. Once pasted, all the instances will become frames as they are no longer attached to their master components. All the names of all the layers must match the original components.
2. Select the Character Display frame(s) or parent frame (where all the children are Character Display frames) you want to convert.
3. Press Convert and a toast message will show how many were converted or skipped.
4. All the frames that were copy and pasted over are now converted to instances for which their master components are in the current document. 

Grouping and Sorting List
1. Navigate to the Sorting tab.
2. Select a frame containing only Character Displays.
3. Select the property to group by, the property(s) to sort by, the grouping and sorting direction(s), the direction to sort the ID's (the last property to sort by), and the number of Character Displays per row.
4. Press Sort.

Adding Background to List
1. Navigate to the Background Tab.
2. Select the frame you want to add a background to.
3. Select the Background Type and Background Name you want to add to the frame. You can see the available backgrounds in the Background Page.
4. Press Create/Update.

Resizing Existing Background
1. Navigate to the Background Tab.
2. Select the frame you want to add a background to.
3. Press Resize. You would want to do this if the frame has been resized and the background no longer fits or is no longer centered.

Removing a Background.
1. Navigate to the Background Tab.
2. Select the frame you want to remove a background from.
3. Press Remove.

Introduction

This is the basic version of the Data Vision chart generator plugin, designed to help users create simple and effective data visualizations such as line, bar, donut, and pie charts. For advanced features like more customization, additional chart types, and more robust data handling, please try the Data Vision Pro version.


Function Description

  4. Export charts as Figma frames for further design adjustments.
  5. Multilingual support, including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, and Korean.


Usage Instructions

  1. Choose the type of chart you want to create.
  2. Enter your data labels and values, and select a color scheme or customize colors.
  3. Set the chart dimensions, if needed, and click the "Generate Chart" button.
  4. View the generated chart as a Figma frame, and make further adjustments as needed.


Notes

  1. This basic version includes essential chart types and features.
  2. Ensure all data fields are filled out before generating a chart.
  3. For more chart types, advanced styling, and professional-level features, check out the Data Vision Pro version.


介绍

这是 Data Vision 图表生成器插件的基础版，旨在帮助用户轻松创建简单有效的数据可视化图表，包括折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。该版本支持自定义颜色和导出设计功能。欲体验更多自定义功能、额外的图表类型以及更强大的数据处理能力，请尝试 Data Vision Pro 版本。

使用方法

model.name: Figma Chat
model.description:
This plugin helps you to interact inside your files with other peoples.

It's a simple chat with the ability to send text and the current selections of frames or other elements. Just select the elements you want to send to other people and tick the checkbox.


How to use?


First of all, open the "Figma Chat" plugin inside your file.

The plugin generates a random room name and a secret key. These two strings are available to all editors inside the file.


The room name: This string is used to let the server know where to send the messages to.

The secret key: This string is used to en- and decrypt all messages.


The plugin handles all the stuff for you!


At the bottom of the plugin you can enter the user list and access the "Settings" page. Set an avatar and the color and if you want a custom server (https://github.com/ph1p/figma-chat).


An important function is to send your current selection. You can easily do this by selecting one or more elements and clicking the element that appears inside the chat bar.


MY CHAT DOES NOT START :o


If this is the case, please use the "reset" button. This will reset all data an generates new keys for you :)


---


Always note: All messages are encrypted and can only be read by people who are able to run plugins inside your file.

Feel free to write me if you have any problems or feedback (:

Please use the GitHub Issues (https://github.com/ph1p/figma-chat/issues) or follow me on twitter and write me a DM https://twitter.com/phlp_
model.tagline: An easy to use chat for figma, figjam and dev mode

model.name: Typist - animated typing text for forms and chat UI
model.description:
Typist helps make your prototypes look so so real by turning text layers into animated, typing text components. No more super-fake janky forms! Bring that chat interface you're working on to life!


What Typist does


Typist generates components for you from text layers in your Figma file. These can help dial up the realism on your presentations and can be indispensable for stress-testing text-based chat UI. The components that Typist generates are animated based on your preferences, and all you have to do is drop them into your prototype to get some of your very own RAD TEXT TYPING ACTION.


How to use Typist


  1. Select one or more text layers in your Figma file and run the plugin.
  2. Specify how you want the typing animation to look.
  3. Hit the "Create component" button to generate components from your selected text layers.
  4. Use those components as you wish in your prototypes.


Typist tips n' tricks


First of all, Typist respects your text layers' width settings. If you create a component from a text layer set to Auto Width, the component will resize horizontally. If you create one from a text layer set to Auto Height, it'll resize vertically.

  • Auto width text fields are better for single line forms, cause you can put them into an Auto Layout with a cursor gif and it looks cool
  • Auto height text fields are better for multiple-turn chat animations that build up vertically, because you can wrap the whole thing in an Auto Layout and it'll manage it's own height
  • Examples of both of these most common use cases are in the Playground file, pls enjoy


The "Type by" setting tells Typist whether you want to animate individual letters, words, or chunks of text. It's basically the first of two speed controls.

  • The default setting, Type by Word, works pretty well for a paragraph or two of text, like you might see as a response when you're chatting with an AI.
  • If you want to simulate form input or a single line of text, Type by Letter will get you there.
  • If you have a TON of text you can try Type by Multiple Words so you're not waiting around all day.


The "Speed" setting controls the timing between animation steps.


And "Randomness" will apply a little staggery swagger to the generated component. It's less noticeable at faster speed values.


Enjoy!


~ Jay
model.tagline: Generate animated typing components from any text layer.

🌈 ᴘʀᴇᴘᴀʀᴀᴛɪᴏɴ [!important]


  1. Select an existing native FigJam connector you copied from another file
  2. Use Plugin > Set to set it as your copy-paste source


🔗 ᴀᴅᴅ ɴᴀᴛɪᴠᴇ ᴄᴏɴɴᴇᴄᴛᴏʀs

  1. If nothing selected -> It'll create a new connector in your viewing area
  2. If exact 2 elements selected -> It'll connect them based on their relative position
  3. Nothing will happen for other cases


💡 ɴᴏᴛᴇ


  1. Use ⌥+⌘+P to quickly execute Add a Connector again
  2. Every properties of the created connector will be the same as the one you set as the source (eg. set it 1px-dotted-yellow then you can quickly link your page flow under the same style)
  3. The source can be changed whenever you want (by executing Set), but it has to be keep in the file somewhere for the plugin function working


--

Native connector is currently not supported in Figma file, even its plugin API. The technique used here is just simple copy-and-paste. Hide your copy-paste source carefully (normally I put it inside my divider page 😌) in case it being unintentionally deleted by other collaborators.


Bugs / Improvements -> ✉️ khnkenny@gmail.com

model.name: Fix San Francisco
model.description:
This plugin won't fix the city's problems, but it will automatically apply the correct font variant and tracking for selected texts using the San Francisco typeface.


How to Use

  1. Select a Frame or texts with “SF Pro”, “SF Pro Display”, “SF Pro Text”, "SF Pro Rounded", or "New York" fonts.
  2. Run “Fix San Francisco” from Plugins menu.


The plugin will find all relevant texts in your selections and apply the fix.


Note: Texts with text style will not be changed.


Note: For New York, you must use the “New York” font and not the optical variants (“New York Small”, “New York Medium”, etc.) for the plugin to apply the appropriate tracking.


Context

When texts with SF fonts are rendered on iOS, their variant and tracking (letter spacing) are adjusted based on their point size and the user's accessibility settings. In Figma, the tracking must be manually applied to get a more accurate representation. Hence, Fix San Francisco is here to automate this process for you ♥


Inspired by Sketch-SF-UI-Font-Fixer.

  3. Click on another layer to create the connector.
  4. Now you have a connector and can release the Shift key.


⭐️ Features

  1. Auto-update Connector on layer move.
  2. Connector Labels: Add descriptive text to your connectors for improved clarity.
  3. Offset: Make a space between connector and layer
  4. Connector Position: Set the start position of the connector.
  5. Connector Direction: Manually adjust the position of the connector in direction top, bottom, left and right.
  6. Customize Connector Style:

- Size: Adjust the thickness of the connector line.

- Color: Choose a color for the connector line.

- Corner Radius: Round the corners of the connector line.

- Stroke Cap: Select the end style of the connector line (None, Arrow, Triangle, Reversed Triangle, Circle, Diamond).

- Stroke Style: Choose between a solid or dashed line for the connector.

  1. Manage Connector Styles: You can customize your connector style and save it to apply style to another connector.
  2. Connector Management:

- Show/Hide All Connectors: Toggle the visibility of all connectors with a single click.

✨ Get Started for Free

model.name: Plot Pilot
model.description:
Select a Graph Type and start filling in the inputs in the table.


HOW IT WORKS:

Note: Do not delete the auto inserted frame before closing the plugin, or press cancel and it will be deleted itself.


For Bar, Scatter and Rectilinear/Curved Graphs, fill at least two rows to see Plot Pilot in action.

Input rows can be appended with the '++' button in each Graph type.


Rectilinear and Curved Graphs: Enter values for X and Y Axis. Give the axes a label (optional). The axes scales are determined automatically and the numbers can be turned off. Select the Curve checkbox to enable handles to play with Bezier curves for each of the points.


Scatter Plot: Just like Rectilinear/Curved Graphs, enter just the data required in the table and you will experience the magic of graph creation.


Bar Graph: The input table has two fields, Frequency and Bar Label. Enter the Bar heights in Frequency while the latter field is optional. Just like the other graphs, the scale is automatically determined based on inputs.


Pie Charts: Enter values in decimals for each row. For example: 0.15, 0.15, 0.2, 0.5 would create a complete Pie chart.

model.name: 数据生成图表可视化工具（专业版） Data Vision Chart Pro
model.description:
Introduction

This plugin enables users to create beautiful and interactive charts directly within Figma. Whether you need a bar, line, donut, or pie chart, the plugin offers real-time updates and customizable styles for seamless data visualization.


Function Description

  1. Create different chart types: Line, Bar, Donut, and Pie charts.
  2. Customize chart styles with predefined themes or use custom colors.
  3. Easily add, edit, and remove data rows with an intuitive interface.
  4. Export generated charts directly as Figma frames for further design use.
  5. Support for multiple languages, including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, and Korean.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select the chart type you want to create.
  2. Input the required data and choose a predefined color scheme or customize it.
  3. Set the chart dimensions (width and height) as per your design needs.
  4. Click "Generate Chart" to create the chart frame in Figma.
  5. Customize the chart further by adjusting colors and data points as needed.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports dynamic data updates and real-time chart previews.
  2. Ensure that all necessary data rows are filled to avoid incomplete chart generation.
  3. You can switch between chart types to explore different data visualizations.


介绍

此插件让用户可以直接在 Figma 中创建漂亮且交互式的图表。无论是柱状图、折线图、环形图还是饼图，插件都提供实时更新和自定义样式，助力轻松进行数据可视化。


功能说明

  1. 支持生成不同类型的图表：折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。
  2. 提供多种预设主题配色，或使用自定义颜色。
  3. 直观界面，轻松添加、编辑和删除数据行。
  4. 将生成的图表直接导出为 Figma 的框架，用于后续设计。
  5. 支持多种语言，包括英语、简体中文、繁体中文、印地语、日语和韩语。


使用方法

  1. 选择您需要创建的图表类型。
  2. 输入所需数据，选择预设配色或自定义颜色。
  3. 根据设计需要设置图表尺寸（宽度和高度）。
  4. 点击“生成图表”按钮，即可在 Figma 中创建图表框架。
  5. 您可以根据需要进一步调整图表的颜色和数据点。


注意事项

  1. 插件支持动态数据更新和实时图表预览。
  2. 确保所有必要的数据行已填写完整，以避免生成不完整的图表。
  3. 您可以在不同的图表类型之间切换，探索不同的数据可视化效果。

model.name: Pitchdeck Presentation Studio
model.description:
Documentation & Video Tutorials


For plugin documentation and step by step video tutorials, please visit https://docs.hypermatic.com/pitchdeck


Questions & Support


Pitchdeck is still a baby panda, so if you notice any bugs or have any questions about the plugin, please get in touch directly via https://hypermatic.com/contact and we'll help you troubleshoot and resolve them as quickly as possible.


Security


Pitchdeck is designed to be privacy and security focused — for details about security and how the plugin works, please visit https://docs.hypermatic.com/pitchdeck/security


Features


  1. Super easy animations and real-time previews inside Figma.
  2. Export slides to an interactive shareable URL to present in the browser.
  3. Export files for PowerPoint/Keynote/Google Slides, with editable text.
  4. Export to a PDF file (with optional password protection).
  5. Import slides from PowerPoint, Google Slides or Keynote (as exported .pptx files) into Figma automatically (BETA)
  6. Add GIFs and YouTube/Vimeo/MP4 video embeds to layers in your slides.
  7. Built-in presentation analytics data and custom share link URLs.
  8. Embed content from Figma, Loom, Canva, Lottie, Google Docs/Sheets/Slides, SoundCloud or Spotify.
  9. Add slide links or website URL links to layers in your slides.
  10. Built-in GIPHY and Pixabay search integrations.
  11. Quickly re-order slides by visual position, Figma layer order or drag and drop.
  12. Automatically generate Charts by adding your own CSV data.
  13. Optional automatic page numbering Figma component for your slides.
  14. Set approval workflow statuses to keep track of which slides are ready.
  15. Automatically generates password protected presentation URLs.
  16. Simple, seamless and easy to use presentations in the browser.
  17. Includes speaker notes, timer, laser pointer, and slide controls.
  18. Control your presentation from your phone/tablet by scanning a QR code.
  19. Present in fullscreen with notes and controls on a second screen.
  20. Spell check your Figma slides in dozens of languages.
  21. The Pitchdeck plugin can be run in both Figma Design files and Figma Slides files.


Creating presentations has never been so easy (and cool).

Everything you need for a great presentation — from animations and to GIFs/videos, to slide notes and lasers, to exporting for PowerPoint/Keynote/Google Slides/PDF.


The simplest presentation interface you've ever used.

Add smooth animations to your any of your Figma slide layers with real-time, directly inside Figma using the Pitchdeck timeline. Select from dozens of premium presets, or craft your own custom animations.


Embed GIFs, videos and iFrames to slide layers.

Simply paste a URL into Pitchdeck to embed GIFs, videos (.mp4, YouTube, Vimeo) and clickable links on any layer. You can also embed content from Figma, Canva, Loom, Lottie, Google Docs/Sheets/Slides, SoundCloud and Spotify.


Simple, password protected slide decks in the browser.

Create a password protected URL for your Figma slides to give a presentation from anywhere. You'll get everything you need to present your Figma slides from a browser window.


Showcase longer pages or website mockups with scrollable slides.

Whether you're presenting website designs to a client, or a portfolio piece in a job interview — Pitchdeck automatically handles longer Figma slides.


Built-in analytics with custom share links.

See how your deck is performing at a high-level and and per-session; create custom URLs for different stakeholders to easily filter your metrics by specific viewers — all instantly exportable to a CSV file.


Export from Figma to PowerPoint, Keynote or Google Slides.

Pitchdeck can also export your Figma slides to files that you can open with Microsoft PowerPoint, Google Slides and Apple Keynote with editable text, or easily share the file via email and Slack.


Export your slides from Figma to PDF.

Export your Figma slides to a single PDF deck in seconds, perfect for quickly sharing via email or Slack. Add optional password protection for securely sending confidential Figma slide decks under NDA.


Import slides from PowerPoint into Figma with one click.

If you already have a presentation designed in PowerPoint, you can automatically import the slides from your .pptx file as editable Figma layers with one click. Please note, this feature is still in BETA.


Pitchdeck Pro


10 free trials of Pitchdeck Pro are included with the free version, and if you're a casual user, you can continue using the free version of Pitchdeck forever.


If you're a power user, you can optionally upgrade to continue using all the extra features that are only available in the pro version of Pitchdeck.


To learn more about Pitchdeck Pro, please visit https://www.hypermatic.com/pitchdeck/#pro

Automagically draw flow arrows in Figma! Illustrate user flows, diagrams, or graphics in a hand-drawn or minimalist style.


Autoflow is free up to 50 flows per file.


Features

  1. Intelligent obstacle detection
  2. Text annotations on path
  3. Custom path routing
  4. Auto-update on moving
  5. Offset start/end terminal spacing
  6. Multiple terminal styles
  7. Pause drawing mode so you can keep the plugin open while working


Get started instantly

  1. Free for up to 50 flows per file
  2. Use across an unlimited number of files


No subscription fees

Get individual lifetime access to Autoflow for a one-time fee of $49 $29 (limited time offer).


This gives...

  1. Unlimited flows per file
  2. All future updates
  3. Support from the developer


--


FAQ


I’m an existing user from before the paid version. What happens to my flows?

Existing flows drawn before the release of the paid version will not count toward the limit. Users of these files will receive 50 free flows on top of existing flows per file.


Do flows that I draw and delete count toward my free flow limit?

Deleted flows won’t count toward the limit. Only flows present on the canvas are counted.


Do you offer business or organization pricing?

Bulk pricing is currently not supported by the Figma plugins marketplace.


Where can I submit feedback or a feature request?

Please DM @davidtzhao on Twitter or email autoflowplugin@gmail.com for inquiries, support, and all else!
